scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:lib && npm run build:management && npm run build:ui
scripts.build:management: cd src/service/management-ui && ../../../bin/tsc && cd ../../.. && npm run copy:management && npm run sass:management
scripts.build:ui: cd src/service/ui && ../../../bin/tsc && cd ../../.. && npm run copy:ui && npm run sass:ui
scripts.copy:lib: cd src/lib/service && cp catalog/data.csv ../../../dist/node_modules/lib/service/catalog && cp -r translation/locales ../../../dist/node_modules/lib/service/translation/locales
scripts.copy:ui: cd src/service/ui && cp src/package.json ../../../dist/service/ui && cp -r component ../../../dist/service/ui/component && cp -r page ../../../dist/service/ui/page && cp -r assets ../../../dist/service/ui/ && rm -rf ../../../dist/service/ui/assets/styles
scripts.copy:management: cd src/service/management-ui && cp src/package.json ../../../dist/service/management-ui && cp -r component ../../../dist/service/management-ui/component && cp -r page ../../../dist/service/management-ui/page && cp -r assets ../../../dist/service/management-ui/ && rm -rf ../../../dist/service/management-ui/assets/styles
scripts.start:all: npm run start:management & npm run start:ui
